EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-PS for CSPs 2018-Email Nurture-T0027V.T0027V.Email 1 - Bell Labs WP.Busin
EmailTemplate.subject: Here’s how to profitably deliver LTE for public safety
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Mission-critical LTE to protect the public and power your business growth When working with governments to deliver mission-critical LTE for public safety, the best results will come when both parties share the investments, risks and rewards.
Various business models are possible, but which will meet your needs?
Our new white paper describes a detailed analysis by Bell Labs Consulting of different Public Private Partnerships and reveals a solid business case for mobile network operators with attractive returns.
It’s time to take action, with Nokia as your expert partner. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
